IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM Ten
2019/KER/156
PRESENT
THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.SUDHEENDRA KUMAR
THURSDAY ,THE O3RD DAY OF JANUARY 2019 / 13TH POUSHA, 1940
Cr1.MC.No. 8930 of 2018
AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN C.M.P.NO.1757/2018 IN
cc 110/2018 of J.M.F.C.-I, PEERUMEDU DATED 13-11-2018
PETITIONER/S:
MANIMARAN 5S.
AGED 52 YEARS
S/O. SREENIVASAN, IYYAR BANGLAVU,
M.M.S COLONY, IIND STREET,
MADURAI-14,TAMIL NADU STATE.
BY ADVS.
SRI .T.A.UNNIKRISHNAN
SRI .K.K.AKHIL
RESPONDENT/S:
STATE OF KERALA,
REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR,
HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM, PIN-682031.
OTHER PRESENT:
SRI E C BINEESH-PUBLIC PROSECUTOR
THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION
ON 03.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE
FOLLOWING:

_
sete,
Cri.MC.No. 8930 of 2018
-2-
ORDER
The petitioner is accused No.2 in
C.C. No.110/2018 on the files of the court
below. The petitioner filed CMP No.1757/2018
before the court below, praying for
releasing the passport to the petitioner,
which was produced by the petitioner before
the court below at the time of executing the
bail bond. The court below as per
Annexure-II order dismissed the said
petition, against which this Crl1.M.C. has
been filed.
2. Heard.
3. It was observed in Annexure-II order
by the learned Magistrate that the

2019/KERIIS6
Cri.MC.No. 8930 of 2018
-3-

petitioner did not state about the place
where he would propose to_ go. The
petitioner only stated that he is going
abroad for higher studies. However, there
was no mention in the petition about the
course for which he would propose to make
higher studies. The name of the University
to which he proposes to join for higher
studies was also not mentioned in the
petition. In view of the above reasons,
the court below rightly dismissed
CMP No.1757/2018. Having gone through the
order impugned, I do not find anything to
interfere with Annexure-II order.

In the result, this Crl1.M.C. stands
dismissed.

ap
2019/KER/156
Crl.MC.No. 8930 of 2018
-4-

However, the petitioner shall be at
liberty to file fresh petition before the
court below, stating all the details
mentioned above and the document/ documents
to support the same. If the petitioner
files any such petition before the court
below, the court below shall consider and
dispose of the said petition in accordance
with law as expeditiously as possible.

Sd/-
B. SUDHEENDRA KUMAR,
JUDGE
STK
/[TRUE COPY//
//P.A. TO JUDGE//
